answers.answer: Hi, it difficult to predict the prognosis. If she is stabilized and there are no more strokes you can be optimistic. Hope are vitals are stable. Depending on the area of brain affected she would have manifested the symptoms. With control of high risk factors like diabetes and hypertension and rehabilitation, she is likely to improve. Good luck with her recovery. Regards.

question: Has anyone ever knowen anyone that had three strokes and came out of them with mimumal complcations?  My aunt had three of them the first one affected her left side but she was able to speak but it was slurry and then she had another one in the hospitial and that one put her in coma and she had a slight one in there as well but that one went away but she has been unable to speak and she does open her eyes but for a short time we put a trach tube in cause they said the breathing tube had to come out everything is stablelized but now we are just waiting for her to come out of it has anyone had this and what is the chance of recovery?  Docs seem pretty confident that she will come out but to what effect they dont know but pretty sure she will wake up can anyone help or give me advice I would apprecaite it.
title: three strokes
